titleStmt.title: The longing shepherdesse or Laddy lye neere me. [T]o the tune of, Laddy lye neere me: or The green garter.
titleStmt.author: Guy, Richard, writer of ballads.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard [i.e. Robert] Guy by Wing.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Imperfect: left half-sheet only, filmed with right half of "The crost couple",( Wing 2nd ed., C7266 varian)t; cropped; imprint wanting.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
